fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to Cover a Corrupt Cop. They will be innocent tonight, and will not be seen as having done any suspicious actions.
- Once per game during the day, you may manipulate the trial, removing all votes from all Corrupt Cops and ending the day early. You can only do this after N2.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You are seen as a good player
